mapper.select: /* common-code.findListGroupCodeAttributeAndAttrValue */ SELECT CCC.TEN_ID /*시스템 아이디*/ ,CCC.CCD /*그룹 코드*/ ,CCC.CSTR_CND_CD /*속성 코드*/ ,CCC.CSTR_CND_NM /*속성 코드 명*/ ,CCC.CSTR_CND_NM_EN /*속성 코드 영문 명*/ ,CCC.CSTR_CND_SORT /*정렬 순서*/ ,CCC.USE_YN /*사용 여부*/ ,CCC.RMK /*비고*/ ,CCC.STS /*상태*/ ,CCC.REGR_ID /*등록자 아이디*/ ,CCC.REG_DTTM /*등록 일시*/ ,CCC.MODR_ID /*수정자 아이디*/ ,CCC.MOD_DTTM /*수정 일시*/ ,CCCV.CSTR_CND_VAL /*상세 코드 속성 값 */ FROM CCD_CSTR_CND CCC LEFT JOIN CCD_CSTR_CND_VAL CCCV ON CCCV.TEN_ID = CCC.TEN_ID AND CCCV.CCD = CCC.CCD AND CCCV.CSTR_CND_CD = CCC.CSTR_CND_CD AND CCCV.DTLCD = #{p.dtlcd} WHERE CCC.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND CCC.CCD = #{p.ccd} ORDER BY CCC.CSTR_CND_SORT ,CCC.CSTR_CND_CD

/* common-code.findListGroupDetailCode */ SELECT DTL.TEN_ID /*시스템 아이디*/ ,DTL.CCD /*그룹 코드*/ ,DTL.DTLCD /*상세 코드*/ ,DTL.DTLCD_SORT /*정렬 순서*/ ,DTL.USE_YN /*사용 여부*/ ,DTL.RMK /*비고*/ ,DTL.STS /*상태*/ ,DTL.REGR_ID /*등록자 아이디*/ ,DTL.REG_DTTM /*등록 일시*/ ,DTL.MODR_ID /*수정자 아이디*/ ,DTL.MOD_DTTM /*수정 일시*/ ,#{p.lang_ccd} AS LANG_CCD /*언어 코드*/ ,DTLML.DTLCD_NM /*상세 코드 명*/ ,CASE WHEN DTLML.DTLCD IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS CDDL_SAVE_YN FROM DTLCD DTL LEFT OUTER JOIN DTLCD_MULTLANG DTLML ON DTL.TEN_ID = DTLML.TEN_ID AND DTL.CCD = DTLML.CCD AND DTL.DTLCD = DTLML.DTLCD AND DTLML.LANG_CCD = #{p.lang_ccd} WHERE DTL.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND DTL.CCD = #{p.ccd} AND DTL.STS != 'D' ORDER BY DTL.DTLCD_SORT ,DTL.DTLCD
mapper.update: /* common-code.updateGroupCodeDetailInfo */ MERGE INTO DTLCD DTL USING ( SELECT #{g.tenant} AS TEN_ID , #{p.ccd} AS CCD , #{p.dtlcd} AS DTLCD , #{p.dtlcd_sort,jdbcType=INTEGER} AS DTLCD_SORT , #{p.use_yn} AS USE_YN , #{p.rmk} AS RMK , #{g.username} AS REGR_ID , #{g.now} AS REG_DTTM , #{g.username} AS MODR_ID , #{g.now} AS MOD_DTTM FROM DUM_TBL /* ONE ROW DATA DUMMY TABLE */ ) B ON ( DTL.TEN_ID = B.TEN_ID AND DTL.CCD = B.CCD AND DTL.DTLCD = B.DTLCD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET DTL.MODR_ID = B.MODR_ID /* 수정자 아이디 */ , DTL.MOD_DTTM = B.MOD_DTTM /* 수정 일시 */ , DTL.DTLCD_SORT = B.DTLCD_SORT /*정렬 순서*/ , DTL.USE_YN = B.USE_YN /*사용 여부*/ WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( TEN_ID /*시스템 아이디*/ , STS /*상태*/ , REGR_ID /*등록자 아이디*/ , REG_DTTM /*등록 일시*/ , CCD /*그룹 코드*/ , DTLCD /*상세 코드*/ , DTLCD_SORT /*정렬 순서*/ , USE_YN /*사용 여부*/ , RMK /*비고*/ ) VALUES ( B.TEN_ID , 'C' , B.REGR_ID , B.REG_DTTM , B.CCD , B.DTLCD , B.DTLCD_SORT , B.USE_YN , B.RMK )
mapper.select: /* common-code.findGroupCodeDetailInfo */ SELECT TEN_ID ,CCD ,DTLCD ,DTLCD_SORT ,USE_YN ,RMK ,REGR_ID ,REG_DTTM ,MODR_ID ,MOD_DTTM FROM DTLCD WHERE TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND CCD = #{p.ccd} AND DTLCD = #{p.dtlcd}
